subject: Issue with VAM (non pro) Haptics.
description_text:
I received my order #SSN3248 with pedals and haptics. I tested the haptics,
but there is an issue with the clutch haptic. In the Simsonn manager, when
I do a vibration test of the clutch haptic, it sounds really strange
(quality issue?) like it's broken, unlike the brake and throttle haptics,
which seem to work pretty well.

I'm going to send a video of my issue: in this video, I will do a test
vibration at 30% strength of both haptics (clutch and brake). I will first
test the clutch and then the brake, and we can hear that the clutch at the
same strength doesn't make the same sound (it makes a little noise), and if
I go to about 100% strength, the sound is very strange, like it's broken,
but the brake sounds normal. I don't want to do it anymore at 100% because
I don't want to damage the clutch. If you respond, I can do it at 100%, and
maybe we can go for an exchange?

Luca Fragapane
 IMG_0773.MOV
<https://drive.google.com/file/d/1oMy4i83myBK7aBCo0EgorzqFLvebRmGP/view?usp=drive_web>

[image: IMG_0772.jpeg]

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 7362 中
